content: दातृ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (त्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [दा-तृच्] {@--1@} Giving offering, granting, presenting, bestowing, imparting, &c. {@--2@} Liberal. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (ता) {@--1@} A giver (in general); <ls>Ku. 6. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A donor; <ls>Bv. 1. 66.</ls> {@--3@} A lender, creditor. {@--4@} A teacher. {@--5@} A cutter.
